The complexity level of this table is considered medium. While the table structure itself is straightforward, the use of user-defined functions for default values and the potential integration with other tables or systems (e.g., user management) adds a layer of complexity. The table does not have foreign keys, which simplifies its immediate relational complexity but may indicate reliance on external systems or tables for full functionality.
